title: Please help me idenfity this font?????? 'served'
content:
Hi i stumbled across this font ’served’  
and really need to know A: what it is?  
and B: can I buy it.

sorry only have ’served’ as letters

[http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/4117/servedlogo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091123095750/http:/img197.imageshack.us/img197/4117/servedlogo.jpg "http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/4117/servedlogo.jpg")

found the original source site but still can’t identify the font.

[http://www.theserved.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20091123095750/http:/www.theserved.com/ "http://www.theserved.com/")

It’s a behance network site but no indicators in source code, hopefully that link is enough to go on

thanks for your help in advance.

Matt
author: karmakida
